message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe will be a great asset for you.  I'm asking for $13000. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value to you, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $12000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price.  How about $12500? This would be a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I am able to offer $12200 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
